TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit SpinLock extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 提供一个相互排斥锁基元，在该基元中，尝试获取锁的线程将在重复检查的循环中等待，直至该锁变为可用为止。

span.span: Provides a mutual exclusion lock primitive where a thread trying to acquire the lock waits in a loop repeatedly checking until the lock becomes available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何使用旋转锁定的示例, 请参阅[如何:使用旋转锁进行低级别同步](~/docs/standard/threading/how-to-use-spinlock-for-low-level-synchronization.md)。For an example of how to use a Spin Lock, see [How to: Use SpinLock for Low-Level Synchronization](~/docs/standard/threading/how-to-use-spinlock-for-low-level-synchronization.md). 自旋锁可用于叶级锁, 在这种情况下, 通过使用、大小或由于垃圾回收压力而隐含的对象分配的成本非常高。Spin locks can be used for leaf-level locks where the object allocation implied by using a , in size or due to garbage collection pressure, is overly expensive. 旋转锁定有助于避免阻塞;但是, 如果你预计会有大量的阻塞, 则可能由于旋转过多而无法使用自旋锁。A spin lock can be useful to avoid blocking; however, if you expect a significant amount of blocking, you should probably not use spin locks due to excessive spinning. 当锁的粒度较大且数值较大 (例如, 链接列表中的每个节点都有一个锁) 以及锁保留时间始终极短时, 旋转可能非常有利。Spinning can be beneficial when locks are fine-grained and large in number (for example, a lock per node in a linked list) and also when lock hold-times are always extremely short. 通常, 在持有自旋锁时, 应避免使用以下任何操作:In general, while holding a spin lock, one should avoid any of these actions: - 堵塞blocking, - 调用自身可能会阻止的任何内容,calling anything that itself may block, - 同时保留多个自旋锁,holding more than one spin lock at once, - 进行动态调度的调用 (interface 和虚方法),making dynamically dispatched calls (interface and virtuals), - 对任何代码进行静态调度调用, 而不是任何代码, 或making statically dispatched calls into any code one doesn't own, or - 分配内存。allocating memory. 仅应在确定这样做后使用才能改善应用程序的性能。 should only be used after you have been determined that doing so will improve an application's performance. 出于性能方面的考虑, 还必须注意, 是值类型。It is also important to note that is a value type, for performance reasons. 出于此原因, 必须注意不要意外复制实例, 因为两个实例 (原始和副本) 将完全独立, 这可能会导致应用程序出现错误的行为。For this reason, you must be very careful not to accidentally copy a instance, as the two instances (the original and the copy) would then be completely independent of one another, which would likely lead to erroneous behavior of the application. 如果必须传递实例, 则它应按引用而不是按值传递。 If a instance must be passed around, it should be passed by reference rather than by value. 不要在只读字段中存储实例。Do not store instances in readonly fields. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用:The following example shows how to use a : [!code-csharp[System.Threading.SpinLock#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.spinlock/cs/spinlock.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.SpinLock#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.spinlock/vb/spinlock.vb#01)]

threadsafe.span: 的所有成员都是线程安全的, 可同时从多个线程使用。

span.span: All members of are thread-safe and may be used from multiple threads concurrently.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool enableThreadOwnerTracking) cil managed

param.name: enableThreadOwnerTracking
param.span: 是否捕获线程 ID 并将其用于调试目的。

span.span: Whether to capture and use thread IDs for debugging purposes.

summary.span: 使用用于跟踪线程 ID 以改善调试的选项初始化 结构的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the structure with the option to track thread IDs to improve debugging.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Enter(bool& lockTaken) cil managed
Public Sub Enter (ByRef lockTaken As Boolean)

param.name: lockTaken
param.span: 如果已获取锁，则为 true，否则为 false。

span.span: True if the lock is acquired; otherwise, false.

param.span: 调用此方法前，必须将 始化为 false。

span.span: must be initialized to false prior to calling this method.

summary.span: 采用可靠的方式获取锁，这样，即使在方法调用中发生异常的情况下，都能采用可靠的方式检查 以确定是否已获取锁。

span.span: Acquires the lock in a reliable manner, such that even if an exception occurs within the method call, can be examined reliably to determine whether the lock was acquired.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是非重入锁, 这意味着, 如果线程持有锁, 则不允许再次进入该锁。 is a non-reentrant lock, meaning that if a thread holds the lock, it is not allowed to enter the lock again. 如果启用了线程所有权跟踪 (无论是否已启用), 则当线程尝试重新进入已持有的锁时, 将引发异常。If thread ownership tracking is enabled (whether it's enabled is available through ), an exception will be thrown when a thread tries to re-enter a lock it already holds. 但是, 如果禁用了线程所有权跟踪, 尝试输入已持有的锁将导致死锁。However, if thread ownership tracking is disabled, attempting to enter a lock already held will result in deadlock. 如果调用时没有首先调用的内部状态, 则可能会损坏。If you call without having first called the internal state of the can become corrupted.

exception.span: 在调用 Enter 之前， 参数必须初始化为 false。

span.span: The argument must be initialized to false prior to calling Enter.

exception.span: 线程所有权跟踪已启用，当前线程已获取此锁定。

span.span: Thread ownership tracking is enabled, and the current thread has already acquired this lock.

related.span: SpinLock

span.span: SpinLock

related.span: 如何：使用 SpinLock 进行低级别同步

span.span: How to: Use SpinLock for Low-Level Synchronization

related.span: 如何：在 SpinLock 中启用线程跟踪模式

span.span: How to: Enable Thread-Tracking Mode in SpinLock
Releases the lock.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Exit() cil managed

span.span: Releases the lock.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的默认重载提供的行为与使用 true 作为参数调用的行为相同。The default overload of provides the same behavior as if calling using true as the argument. 如果调用时没有首先调用的内部状态, 则可能会损坏。If you call without having first called the internal state of the can become corrupted.

exception.span: 启用线程所有权跟踪，当前线程不是此锁的所有者。

span.span: Thread ownership tracking is enabled, and the current thread is not the owner of this lock.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Exit(bool useMemoryBarrier) cil managed

param.name: useMemoryBarrier
param.span: 一个布尔值，该值指示是否应发出内存界定，以便将退出操作立即发布到其他线程。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether a memory fence should be issued in order to immediately publish the exit operation to other threads.
Releases the lock.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将参数设置为 true 的情况调用时, 将以某种性能为代价提高锁的公平。 `useMemoryBarrier`Calling with the `useMemoryBarrier` argument set to true will improve the fairness of the lock at the expense of some performance. 默认重载的行为方式类似于将指定`useMemoryBarrier`为 true。The default overload behaves as if specifying true for `useMemoryBarrier`. 如果调用时没有首先调用的内部状态, 则可能会损坏。If you call without having first called the internal state of the can become corrupted.

exception.span: 启用线程所有权跟踪，当前线程不是此锁的所有者。

span.span: Thread ownership tracking is enabled, and the current thread is not the owner of this lock.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsHeld As Boolean
public: property bool IsHeld { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取锁当前是否已由任何线程占用。

span.span: Gets whether the lock is currently held by any thread.

value.span: 如果锁当前已由任何线程占用，则为 true；否则为 false。

span.span: true if the lock is currently held by any thread; otherwise false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsHeldByCurrentThread As Boolean
public: property bool IsHeldByCurrentThread { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取锁是否已由当前线程占用。

span.span: Gets whether the lock is held by the current thread.

value.span: 如果锁已由当前线程占用，则为 true；否则为 false。

span.span: true if the lock is held by the current thread; otherwise false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果锁已初始化为跟踪所有者线程, 此操作将返回当前线程是否获取了该锁。If the lock was initialized to track owner threads, this will return whether the lock is acquired by the current thread. 在将锁初始化为不跟踪线程所有权时, 使用此属性是无效的。It is invalid to use this property when the lock was initialized to not track thread ownership.

span.span: Thread ownership tracking is disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsThreadOwnerTrackingEnabled As Boolean
public: property bool IsThreadOwnerTrackingEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取是否已为此实例启用了线程所有权跟踪。

span.span: Gets whether thread ownership tracking is enabled for this instance.

value.span: 如果已为此实例启用了线程所有权跟踪，则为 true；否则为 false。

span.span: true if thread ownership tracking is enabled for this instance; otherwise false.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void TryEnter(bool& lockTaken) cil managed
Public Sub TryEnter (ByRef lockTaken As Boolean)

param.name: lockTaken
param.span: 如果已获取锁，则为 true，否则为 false。

span.span: True if the lock is acquired; otherwise, false.

param.span: 调用此方法前，必须将 始化为 false。

span.span: must be initialized to false prior to calling this method.

summary.span: 尝试采用可靠的方式获取锁，这样，即使在方法调用中发生异常的情况下，都能采用可靠的方式检查 以确定是否已获取锁。

span.span: Attempts to acquire the lock in a reliable manner, such that even if an exception occurs within the method call, can be examined reliably to determine whether the lock was acquired.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同, TryEnter 不会阻止等待锁定可用。Unlike , TryEnter will not block waiting for the lock to be available. 如果调用 TryEnter 时该锁不可用, 它将立即返回, 而不会进行任何进一步的旋转。If the lock is not available when TryEnter is called, it will return immediately without any further spinning.

exception.span: 在调用 TryEnter 之前， 参数必须在初始化为 false。

span.span: The argument must be initialized to false prior to calling TryEnter.

exception.span: 线程所有权跟踪已启用，当前线程已获取此锁定。

span.span: Thread ownership tracking is enabled, and the current thread has already acquired this lock.

related.span: SpinLock

MemberSignature.Value: public void TryEnter (int millisecondsTimeout, ref bool lockTaken);
.method public hidebysig instance void TryEnter(int32 millisecondsTimeout, bool& lockTaken) cil managed
Public Sub TryEnter (millisecondsTimeout As Integer, ByRef lockTaken As Boolean)
public: void TryEnter(int millisecondsTimeout, bool % lockTaken);

param.name: millisecondsTimeout
param.span: 等待的毫秒数，或为 (-1)，表示无限期等待。

span.span: The number of milliseconds to wait, or (-1) to wait indefinitely.

param.name: lockTaken
param.span: 如果已获取锁，则为 true，否则为 false。

span.span: True if the lock is acquired; otherwise, false.

param.span: 调用此方法前，必须将 始化为 false。

span.span: must be initialized to false prior to calling this method.

summary.span: 尝试采用可靠的方式获取锁，这样，即使在方法调用中发生异常的情况下，都能采用可靠的方式检查 以确定是否已获取锁。

span.span: Attempts to acquire the lock in a reliable manner, such that even if an exception occurs within the method call, can be examined reliably to determine whether the lock was acquired.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同, TryEnter 不会无限期地阻止等待可用锁。Unlike , TryEnter will not block indefinitely waiting for the lock to be available. 它将被阻止, 直到锁可用或`millisecondsTimeout`已过期。It will block until either the lock is available or until the `millisecondsTimeout` has expired.

exception.span: 是一个非 -1 的负数，而 -1 表示无限期超时。

span.span: is a negative number other than -1, which represents an infinite time-out.

exception.span: 在调用 TryEnter 之前， 参数必须在初始化为 false。

span.span: The argument must be initialized to false prior to calling TryEnter.

exception.span: 线程所有权跟踪已启用，当前线程已获取此锁定。

span.span: Thread ownership tracking is enabled, and the current thread has already acquired this lock.

MemberSignature.Value: public void TryEnter (TimeSpan timeout, ref bool lockTaken);
.method public hidebysig instance void TryEnter(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, bool& lockTaken) cil managed
Public Sub TryEnter (timeout As TimeSpan, ByRef lockTaken As Boolean)
public: void TryEnter(TimeSpan timeout, bool % lockTaken);

param.name: timeout
param.span: 表示等待毫秒数的 ，或表示 -1 毫秒（无限期等待）的 。

span.span: A that represents the number of milliseconds to wait, or a that represents -1 milliseconds to wait indefinitely.

param.name: lockTaken
param.span: 如果已获取锁，则为 true，否则为 false。

span.span: True if the lock is acquired; otherwise, false.

param.span: 调用此方法前，必须将 始化为 false。

span.span: must be initialized to false prior to calling this method.

summary.span: 尝试采用可靠的方式获取锁，这样，即使在方法调用中发生异常的情况下，都能采用可靠的方式检查 以确定是否已获取锁。

span.span: Attempts to acquire the lock in a reliable manner, such that even if an exception occurs within the method call, can be examined reliably to determine whether the lock was acquired.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同, TryEnter 不会无限期地阻止等待可用锁。Unlike , TryEnter will not block indefinitely waiting for the lock to be available. 它将被阻止, 直到锁可用或`timeout`已过期。It will block until either the lock is available or until the `timeout` has expired.

exception.span: 是 -1 毫秒之外的负数，表示无限超时或者超时大于 毫秒。

span.span: is a negative number other than -1 milliseconds, which represents an infinite time-out -or- timeout is greater than milliseconds.

exception.span: 在调用 TryEnter 之前， 参数必须在初始化为 false。

span.span: The argument must be initialized to false prior to calling TryEnter.

exception.span: 线程所有权跟踪已启用，当前线程已获取此锁定。

span.span: Thread ownership tracking is enabled, and the current thread has already acquired this lock.
